representation_information.name: ODF Family. OASIS name: Open Document Format for Office Applications (OpenDocument). ISO name: ISO/IEC 26300, Information technology -- Open Document Format for Office Applications (OpenDocument)
representation_information.description: A family of formats designed for office productivity applications, including word-processing, spreadsheets, and presentations. Specification maintained by OASIS. The regular ODF files are in packages based on the ZIP format and incorporating an XML-based manifest file to list component files. A Flat XML representation is also defined.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
